questions.question: What is the dominant color scheme of the artwork depicted on the canvas?

Describe the texture implied by the paint application in the artwork?

What material appears to be used as the base for the artwork?
What is the apparent depth or thickness of the canvas's border?

Is the background of the artwork uniform in color or texture?
Does the artwork primarily feature organic or geometric forms?
What kind of brushstrokes appear most common in the artwork's execution?
Does the image show any visible artist's signature or marking?
What is the general visual impression conveyed by the image, in one word?
